Name: TimesRespite
DisplayDescription:
On Omega, the holder gains a Shield equal to <EnergyCost>500%</> of <EnergyCost>Energy Cost</> and becomes Immune for 3 seconds.

<Italic>Immune: Cannot be affected by negative effects.</>

Description.Format:
On Omega, the holder gains a Shield equal to <EnergyCost>{ShieldVal}%</> of <EnergyCost>Energy Cost</> and becomes Immune for {Duration} seconds.

<Italic>Immune: Cannot be affected by negative effects.</>

DisplayDescriptionNormalized:
On Omega, the holder gains a Shield equal to 500% of Energy Cost and becomes Immune for 3 seconds.

Immune: Cannot be affected by negative effects.
